numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed something from this graph.
2. If income is greater then the chance of admission acceptance at an elite college is greater.
3. The average admission rate without legacy status is lower than the average admission rate with legacy status at these colleges.
4. A student who has a legacy has 7 chances more than a student who does not have a legacy.
5. A student who has a relative who attended such a college has a better chance than a student who does not have such a relative.
6. I wonder why a student who has a relative at such a college has a better chance.
7. I wonder why a parent's income impacts admission.
9. College acceptance can impact the applications to a college from a high school.
10. Some high schools do not have the right income.
11. Some high schools do not have families at colleges.
12. I ask whether income influences college acceptance.
